text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/soc
  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/wh-payer-subscriber-relationship

name: WhPayerJobTitleValueSet
title: Health Data Connect Job Title Value Set
description: Health Data Connect value set for the job title, based on Bureau of Labor Statistics, Standard Occupational Classification (SOC) system.
